info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:37PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Washington, northeastern Rensselaer and west central Bennington Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 137 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greenwich, or 11 miles northwest of Hoosick Falls, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bennington, Hoosick Falls, Arlington, Shaftsbury, Cambridge, Greenwich, Lee, White Creek, Easton, North Bennington, Sunderland, Old Bennington, Center White Creek, Hoosick Junction, Paper Mill Village, Sodom, Chiselville, Center Falls, Johnsonville and South Shaftsbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
